text: ehi væsiyan nosælakillen siṭi mohotaka ohu nagarayaṭa pivisīya. tama pārśavayen vū keneku hā ohugē saturangen keneku gaha marā gatha. eviṭa tama pārśavayē pudgalayā tama saturangen keneku vū ayaṭa erehi va ohugen udav pætīya. eviṭa ohu(mūsā) ohuṭa paharak gæsīya. eviṭa ohu veta (maraṇaya) tīndu viya. ‘meya ṣeyitāngē kriyāvaki. niyata vaśayenma ohu nomaga yavana pæhædili saturaki’ yæyi ohu pævasīya
